title: Balaji Dosai
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out, Sri lankan
description: Sri Lankan and South Indian food restaurant with several outlets in Kandy (1 near police station, 1 near temple of the tooth, 1 on Senanayake street). No Colombo Street location as of May 2016. This location offers more choices. Around 65rs for lunch packet (rice and veg), 70-140rs for dosai, 70rs for string hoppers, 15-30rs for snacks, 40rs for a sweet, 15rs for black tea.
